attributes.action: Better and more treatments and facilities for mental illnesses in the NHS
attributes.additional_details: The NHS should have more and better mental health treatments and facilities. Often mental illnesses are worse than physical illnesses or broken bones, because it stays with you for longer. People are often too embarrassed to say they have a mental illness, yet a broken bone is happily shown off. Around 4,500 people commit suicide annually, this sad figure needs to be lowered.
